item.description: General: [[Language Learning Advice]] [[Language Learning Resources]] [[Language Learning - List of Situations]] [[Language App Price Chart]] Romance:
Intro About the Chinese Language [[What Do You Call Chinese]]? Script and Sound Grammar Vocabulary More Resources Learning Strats Standard Mandarin Chinese
In short, it depends. When I say “Chinese” or “Mandarin Chinese”, I’m referring to the modern, standardized form of Mandarin Chinese; the same one that’s used in the United Nations.
